changeSet.author: vgaikwad
changeSet.id: Added regular expressions for date formats dd-mm-yyyy and dd-mmm-yyyy to deidentify dates in spr report
changeSet.sql:
insert into catissue_deidentified_text (string_content, delete_line, delete_next_line) values ("\\d{1,2}/\\d{1,2}/\\d{4} \\d{4}\\b", 0, 0);
insert into catissue_deidentified_text (string_content, delete_line, delete_next_line) values ("\\b\\d{1,2}-[a-zA-Z]{3}-\\d{4}", 0, 0);

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: update catissue_specimen_coll_group set REASON_FOR_MISSED_CASE = 'No post ops consent taken within 3 months' where collection_status = 'Not Collected-No post ops consent taken within three months'
update catissue_specimen_coll_group set COLLECTION_STATUS = 'Missed Collection' where COLLECTION_STATUS not in ('Pending', 'Complete')

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Reset TRID counter in key sequence table
changeSet.sql:
select MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(name, 2, length(name)) AS UNSIGNED)) from catissue_specimen_coll_group where name like 'z%' into @TRID_FLAG;
insert into key_seq_generator (identifier, key_value, key_sequence_id, key_type) values (default, 'SGH', @TRID_FLAG ,'TRID');

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Updating default site for CPE from CP
changeSet.sql: update catissue_coll_prot_event cpe join catissue_site_cp site_cp on site_cp.collection_protocol_id = cpe.collection_protocol_id set cpe.default_site_id = site_cp.site_id where cpe.default_site_id is null
